name: Packaging Corporation of America
description: Packaging Corporation of America (PCA) is a leading producer of containerboard and corrugated packaging products in the United States. Founded in 1867 and headquartered in Lake Forest, Illinois, PCA has built a reputation for its commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability in the packaging industry. The company operates a vertically integrated business model, which includes manufacturing containerboard at its mills and converting it into corrugated products at its facilities. PCA's extensive product portfolio includes a variety of corrugated containers, custom packaging solutions, and specialty products designed to meet the diverse needs of its customers across various sectors, including retail, food and beverage, and e-commerce. In addition to its packaging solutions, PCA is deeply committed to environmental stewardship, utilizing sustainable practices in its manufacturing processes and sourcing raw materials responsibly. As one of the largest packaging companies in North America, PCA continues to grow through strategic investments and a focus on customer service, aiming to deliver high-quality packaging solutions that help businesses thrive while promoting a sustainable future.
